title: Brand's Ult is buggy
body:
Recently I have been playing a lot more of brand in this season and I have been noticing that his ult sometimes doesn't bother bouncing between targets and only disappears after the initial impact. There would be instances such as where I would ult elise in her spider form where she has 3-4 spiderlings around her, yet the ult just dissipates after the first contact with elise. It's gotten to the point where i'm noticing this occur about one-third of the time that I use brand ult and it has become enough of a nuisance to lead to lost fights and spoiled games. 

This bug with his ult disappearing has occurred with several other champions that were clearly in the middle of a creepwave or next to a teammate.

replies.body:
Yeah, I get the same shit.



Although the biggest problem I am having with Brand is his Pyroclasm's Blaze clause doesn't seem to be working. 


Use R on an burning champ and it still seems to bounce to minions 90% of the time. Is this normal?

Hey CyanNation! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
